metadata.title: CVE-2021-28053 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Centreon-Web in Centreon Platform 20.10.0. A SQL injection vulnerability in "Configuration > Users > Contacts / Users" allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the Additional Information parameters.

criterions.comment: centreon-engine package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
